description: Advances from a bustling town to a veritable metropolis, full of the wonders of modern technology. This is the Spartan city phase, where Infantry cost 10% less metal but take 10% longer to train.
tooltip: Advance to City Phase, which unlocks more entities and technologies. Civic Centers 20% territory influence radius, 40% more garrison capacity and +5 range . Structures +5 capture points regeneration rate per garrisoned unit. Infantry gain 1% faster run walk, cost 20% less metal, and gain 1 hack and pierce armor. Citizens 15% longer to train champions 30 more life.
